title: Quality of game problems
body: Every animation looks bad on every champion i play when moving around on summoners rift and i get massive ping spikes out of the blue. really has been killing my interest in playing. been happening ever since 6.9

replies.body:
Given that these ping spikes occur consistently, and given that the champions do not move properly, everything seems to point to some sort of odd connection issue.  Since it's difficult to identify a root cause as to why this is happening, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It'll take a look at your games, perform a health check, and let you know what steps you can take to help improve your connection!

Let me know if you still experiencing any issues!
